name: Super Stylist Fashion Makeover
summary: There's a new fashion super stylist in town! In this fashion makeover story game make sure your makeup and fashion styling is on point. Be seen! Go to fancy events, win every fashion battle and take pics for the Stylegram. Show off your fashion styling,dress up and make up skills in this makeover story game.
